name: Protocol:Agora-Testing Vanguards
description:
The Year Is 2136.Beginning of the all story.An Astronaut group try to go other side asteroids.But An Asteroid Kill them.Beginning of the all story.

When they examine the Spaceship, they realize that a stray asteroid in space cannot cause that much damage and that an asteroid must have been launched.When they determine the direction this asteroid was launched from and go there, they discover the planet AGORA and decide to organize an operation here. But there were no such soldiers on earth.

Testing the vanguards(space soldiers) inside AGORA Protocol.This Protocols aim is invade the AGORA Planet.
